item.title: Battlefield 6 Glitches Have Players Flying Around The Map
item.content:encoded:
Battlefield 6 has been in the open for almost a week, and it has been met with a solid response from players worldwide, except for the lacklustre campaign offering. The multiplayer platform is enjoyable, stable, and receiving constant tweaks by the Electronic Arts studios that fed energy into the creation of the first-person shooter.

In recent days, it has seemed as though the studios under the EA banner are working overtime to keep up with the number of movement exploits and glitches that are being uncovered by players, promising to patch them out as they crop up.

item.title: Complete Wreckreation Achievement Listâ€”How to Get All Achievements and Trophies
item.content:encoded:
Wreckreation is another spiritual successor to the beloved Burnout series, and now we know the full list of achievements and trophies.

With the game being one of 76 titles that Embracer Group is pushing, you would hope that there would be quite a bit of substance to it. Luckily, it does appear that you will have plenty of runway to enjoy the different aspects of this game.

Here is the full list of Wreckreation achievements and trophies.

Wreckreation Achievement and Trophy List

There are a total of 46 achievements in Wreckreation, which would make 47 trophies when you include the platinum. 

As of this writing, we do not know the name of the platinum, but we have the name criteria for unlocking every other trophy.

Burnout fans will notice quite a few similarities with Wreckreation when they read the achievement list above. For example, Road Rage is a mode that originated in that series and involves you forcing the opposition to crash while speeding down the road.

Those similarities are not surprising, though, as the development team for Wreckreation, Three Fields Entertainment, is made up of members from the original iteration of Criterion, who made the Burnout series that EA has completely forgotten about these days. They have developed Danger Zone and Dangerous Driving, which obviously have a lot of Burnout energy in them, and you see that even more now with Wreckreation.

Do you think you can get all achievements and trophies in Wreckreation? Let us know in the comments or on the Insider Gaming forum.
